title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 217 - MOTOR VEHICLE EMISSIONS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 217 - MOTOR VEHICLE EMISSIONS
State Regulations

Subpart 217-1 - MOTOR VEHICLE ENHANCED INSPECTION AND MAINTENANCE PROGRAM REQUIREMENTS UNTIL DECEMBER 31, 2010 (§ 217-1.1 to 217-1.5)

Subpart 217-2 - Repealed

Subpart 217-3 - Idling Prohibition for Heavy Duty Vehicles (§ 217-3.1 to 217-3.4)

Subpart 217-4 - Inspection and Maintenance Program Audits Until December 31, 2010 (§ 217-4.1 to 217-4.4)

Subpart 217-5 - HEAVY DUTY INSPECTION AND MAINTENANCE PROGRAM (§ 217-5.1 to 217-5.8)

Subpart 217-6 - Motor Vehicle Enhanced Inspection and Maintenance Program Requirements Beginning January 1, 2011 (§ 217-6.1 to 217-6.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 217

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0320, 71-2103, 71-2105;Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 301 [c], 375.28

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Subpart 217-1 - MOTOR VEHICLE ENHANCED INSPECTION AND MAINTENANCE PROGRAM REQUIREMENTS UNTIL DECEMBER 31, 2010 (§ 217-1.1 to 217-1.5)

Subpart 217-2 - Repealed

Subpart 217-3 - Idling Prohibition for Heavy Duty Vehicles (§ 217-3.1 to 217-3.4)

Subpart 217-4 - Inspection and Maintenance Program Audits Until December 31, 2010 (§ 217-4.1 to 217-4.4)

Subpart 217-5 - HEAVY DUTY INSPECTION AND MAINTENANCE PROGRAM (§ 217-5.1 to 217-5.8)

Subpart 217-6 - Motor Vehicle Enhanced Inspection and Maintenance Program Requirements Beginning January 1, 2011 (§ 217-6.1 to 217-6.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 217

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§1-0101, 1-0303, 3-0301, 19-0103, 19-0105, 19-0107, 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0305, 19-0320, 71-2103, 71-2105;Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 301 [c], 375.28

The amended version of this part by

New York State Register October 11, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 41, eff. 10/21/2023
is not yet available.
